name: Johnny's Routine
description:
You play as johnny as he wades through his daily routine

Programming: Casually_worrying
Art: SomeFarang
Music: Draelent

This game was made for the Dani's Basement Jam #2 and the Weekly Game Jam - 182 happening at the same time.

It follows both themes: "Once upon a terrible time" and "Cthulhu".
